import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PostService } from '../Services/post.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-postlists', templateUrl: './postlists.component.html', styleUrls: ['./postlists.component.css'], //providers:[PostService] }) export class PostlistsComponent { posts: any[]; constructor(p:PostService) { this.posts=p.PostList; } }
